name: convert_to_toon
description: Convert JSON data to TOON (Token-Optimized Object Notation) format for reduced token consumption. Achieves 40-60% token reduction on typical JSON payloads.

aggressive.description: Use aggressive compression for maximum token savings

name: convert_to_json
description: Convert TOON format back to standard JSON. Fully reversible conversion restores original data structure.

toon_data.description: TOON formatted data to convert back to JSON

name: analyze_patterns
description: Analyze JSON data and detect patterns that can be optimized for compression. Returns detected patterns and compression recommendations.

json_data.description: JSON data to analyze for compression patterns

name: get_compression_strategy
description: Get the optimal compression strategy for JSON data based on its structure and patterns. Returns recommended settings and expected savings.

json_data.description: JSON data to analyze for optimal compression strategy

name: calculate_savings
description: Calculate potential token savings from TOON conversion without performing the actual conversion. Useful for estimating cost reduction.

json_data.description: Original JSON data to calculate potential savings

name: batch_convert
description: Convert multiple JSON objects to TOON format in a single operation. Efficient for processing arrays of similar objects.

json_array.description: Array of JSON objects to convert (as string)

aggressive.description: Use aggressive compression for maximum savings
